gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 142, Pistons 124
gameRecap.excerpt: Dallas defeats Detroit, 142-124. For Dallas, Luka Doncic led the way recording his 16th triple double of the year and 72nd of his career with 39 points, 10 rebounds, and 10 assists, three steals and two blocks while aided by Kyrie Irving (21 points, five assists) and Daniel Gafford (17 points, seven rebounds, four blocks) in the victory. Cade Cunningham finished with 33 points, nine rebounds, and 10 assists with Simone Fontecchio tallying 27 points and James Wiseman recording 17 points and 12 rebounds for Detroit in the losing effort. Dallas improves to 36-28, while Detroit moves to 10-53 in the loss.
